segments.text: Can you shorten this pipe for me ? It's too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'll do it after lunch . What length do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you take 15 mm of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , no problem . It'll be ready by 2 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2
